metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17000 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An object tag with a data URI did not correctly inherit the document'sContent Security Policy. This allowed a CSP bypass in a cross-origin frameif the document's policy explicitly allowed data: URIs. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 70.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
